interpretation:
The "smiling face with horns" emoji represents mischief, temptation, and the darker side of human nature. It suggests that the user may be feeling mischievous or playful, or that they may be struggling with their inner demons. This card can also indicate a person or situation that is deceitful or manipulative, so be wary of those around you.

When this card appears in a reading, it may be a warning to stay true to your morals and values, and resist the temptation to give in to negative impulses. It may also indicate that you need to be more aware of the intentions of others and protect yourself from deceitful behavior.

Overall, the "smiling face with horns" card is a reminder to stay true to yourself and be mindful of the darker aspects of human nature.
